#include <bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;

typedef long long int ll;
const ll mod=1e9+7;

#define fileinput freopen("input.txt","r",stdin)
#define fileoutput freopen("output.txt","w",stdout)
#define T ll t ; cin>>t ; while(t--)

int main()
{
    T{
        char s[100];
        scanf("%s",s);

        ll ans=0;
        for(ll i=0;i<strlen(s);i++){
            ans+=s[i]-'A'+1;
        }

        printf("%lld\n",ans);
    }

    return 0;
}
